SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Eliza Dames’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope we realize that building connections with families and students will forever change how we perceive the world…”

– Mrs. Eliza Dames, Kindergarten Educator @FCASD https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/building-connections-families-students-change-perceive-world/
